body_html: I'm afraid that right now this approach won't work anyway. The only way to pass an object to another process, and maintain sharing of the tensors is to use a Queue. We should subclass Process and fix that
body_text: I'm afraid that right now this approach won't work anyway. The only way to pass an object to another process, and maintain sharing of the tensors is to use a Queue. We should subclass Process and fix that
body: I'm afraid that right now this approach won't work anyway. The only way to pass an object to another process, and maintain sharing of the tensors is to use a Queue. We should subclass `Process` and fix that
